item.title: Voltage, Current and Resistance
item.description: To understand voltage, current and resistance let us consider a very simple circuit containing a copper wire connected across the two terminals of a battery. The batteryIt is beyond the scope of this article to describe the working of a battery but it would to sufficient to describe it as a device which contains two terminals coming out of an enclosure. Chemicals are filled inside this enclosure and are constantly reacting.
